data: It was like a cave, a great vaulted cave which echoed back my first hesitant movements on the slab and tossed them from wall to wall until the darkness about me was all one vast rustling.
Krepps, Robert W., 1919-1980; Terry, W. E., 1921-1992 [Illustrator]
